ElasticSearch.ExceptionQuery: app_name : {0} AND type : exception AND log_time: [{{0}} TO {{1}}]
ElasticSearch.FailureQuery: app_name : {0} AND type : api AND status : failure AND log_time: [{{0}} TO {{1}}]
ElasticSearch.BookingStatsQuery: app_name: nextgen_order_transaction_api AND api : book_actor_service AND NOT (cid: BZ-* OR cid: perf* OR cid: test*) AND agency_tenant_id : prdloyalty AND log_time: [{{0}} TO {{1}}]
ElasticSearch.SorcBookingQuery: app_name : order_sync_webhook AND api : order_sync  AND verb : order_transaction_completed AND agency_tenant_id: prdloyalty AND cid: {0} AND log_time: [{{0}} TO {{1}}]
ElasticSearch.TravcomBookingQuery: app_name: travcom_order_listener AND type : api AND category: UpdateTravcomInsert AND action: db_audit AND agency_tenant_id: prdloyalty AND cid : {0} AND log_time: [{{0}} TO {{1}}]
ElasticSearch.CancellationStatsQuery: app_name : {0} AND type : exception AND log_time: [{{0}} TO {{1}}]
ElasticSearch.SorcCancelQuery: app_name : {0} AND type : api AND status : failure AND log_time: [{{0}} TO {{1}}]
ElasticSearch.TravcomCancelQuery: app_name : {0} AND type : api AND status : failure AND log_time: [{{0}} TO {{1}}]
